mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT dup.id as id, dup.analysis_uuid as analysisUuid, dup.component_uuid as componentUuid, dup.hash as hash, dup.index_in_file as indexInFile, dup.start_line as startLine, dup.end_line as endLine FROM duplications_index dup WHERE dup.component_uuid = #{componentUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dup.analysis_uuid = #{analysisUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
